attributes.action: Demand the Korean and Chinese governments ban  the killing of companion animals
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In both Korea and China dogs and cats are rounded up onto lorries or put in cages in market places.  Dogs are bludgeoned to death (this also happens on the government funded dogs farms where dogs are reared for slaughter).   Cats are often boiled alive for'liquid cat' and both dogs and cats are often skinned alive or torn limb from limb whilst still alive.  This is barbaric behaviour and totally unnacceptable in any countries who seeks trade and tourism from the U.K.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
